TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 和 路由事件的資料，以及相關附加事件和預覽事件。

span.span: Provides data for and routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件資料類別會搭配下列附加事件：This event data class is used with the following attached events: - - 此事件資料類別也可搭配基底項目上的下列路由事件。This event data class is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 這些路由的事件轉送先前所列出的附加的事件，使其更容易存取中的一般項目模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - 附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而事件反昇和通道路由事件的版本也會共用事件資料。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 傳送的事件路由，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如果事件或處理事件 (設定為`true`事件資料中)，將不會變更鍵盤焦點。If the event or the event is handled ( is set to `true` in the event data), keyboard focus will not change. 如果事件或處理事件、 鍵盤焦點不會變更。If the event or the event is handled, keyboard focus will not change.

new System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs : System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice * int * System.Windows.IInputElement * System.Windows.IInputElement -> System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs

param.name: keyboard
param.span: 與這個事件相關聯的邏輯鍵盤裝置。

span.span: The logical keyboard device associated with this event.
The time when the input occurred.
The element that previously had focus.
The element that now has focus.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: 對其呼叫處理常式的目標。

span.span: The target to call the handler on.

summary.span: 以型別專屬的方式叫用事件處理常式，這樣做能夠提升事件系統的效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會轉換為泛型處理常式然後再叫用。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 如需這個實作模式和它的原因的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[路由事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
